text:
e="preserve">Laurie Mitchell (born Mickey Koren; July 14, 1928 – September 20, 2018) was an American actress and model. She was born in Manhattan, New York. She was best known for her role as Queen Yllana, the ruler of Venus, in the 1958 science-fiction movie "Queen of Outer Space".
Mitchell died on September 20, 2018 in Perris, California from natural causes, aged 90.
